hero.title: Ke Entropy Technology
hero.subtitle: 刻熵科技
hero.description: Exploring Web3 Innovation Boundaries, Building a Decentralized Future

about.title: About Us
about.content: Ke Entropy Technology is a comprehensive technology enterprise dedicated to building a panoramic Web3 ecosystem. Powered by Matrix Lab, we delve deep into blockchain protocols and economic models; simultaneously, we expand into the application layer with MATRIXLAB EXCHANGE, an all-in-one platform for wallets, trading, and analytics, and incubate 'Immortal Ledger,' an epic on-chain civilization. From infrastructure to digital entertainment, we prioritize innovation and compliance, aiming to provide sustainable decentralized solutions for the digital economy.

0.title: Ke Entropy Strategic Ecosystem Launch
0.summary: Ke Entropy announces its 'One Core, Two Wings' strategy. With Matrix Lab as the technological core, we drive the dual development of the MATRIXLAB EXCHANGE financial platform and the 'Immortal Ledger' metaverse game. We aim to break boundaries and build a complete Web3 ecosystem integrating fundamental research, asset management, and immersive experiences.

1.title: Compliance and Security Statement
1.summary: Adhering to 'Technology for Good, Compliance First,' we focus on blockchain R&D, security audits, and decentralized protocol design. We strictly comply with global regulations. All financial-related operations run within compliance frameworks, ensuring secure and transparent standards for the industry.

footer.copyright: © 2024 Ke Entropy Technology. All rights reserved.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Ke Entropy Technology ('we', 'us', or 'our') respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.title: 1. Information Collection
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us (such as email in contact forms) and automatically collected device information and usage data via Cookies.

sections.title: 2. Use of Information
sections.content: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services, process your requests, send important notifications, and conduct data analysis to optimize user experience.

sections.title: 3. Data Security
sections.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or destruction. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

sections.title: 4. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at 24373054@buaa.edu.cn.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Ke Entropy Technology. By accessing this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

sections.title: 2. Intellectual Property
sections.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Ke Entropy Technology and its licensors.

sections.title: 3. Disclaimer
sections.content: The website is provided on an 'AS IS' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, to the fullest extent permitted by law.

sections.title: 4. Changes
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. That is why we ask you to check this page periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions or business cooperation intentions, please feel free to contact us.

address.label: Address
address.value: 12F, Boyan Building, No. 238 Beisihuan Zhonglu Auxiliary Road, Haidian District, Beijing

cookie.text: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site traffic. By continuing to use this site, you agree to our use of cookies.
